post:

<strong>Dedicated?</strong> 10% off DataShack. One free OS reload within the first 30 days, $25 afterward.  

<strong>How long?</strong> Dedicated servers are usually built within two business days from the time your payment is received.

<strong>/29 max?</strong> Up to one /27 at a time. More become available once your current IPs are 90% utilized. Please provide justification in the 'Notes' field.  

<strong>VPS?</strong> E5-1620 & E5-1650 nodes with SATA RAID 1 HDD and a third drive reserved for backups. OpenVZ virtualization. <del>1 IPv4</del> 3 IPv4![](http://img.co.at/images/d21bdb030c8ba9c4c1c85986fd6ee01b.gif) with every plan, SolusVM and lots of OS to choose from.

<strong>Backups?</strong> Included at no extra cost and taken nightly.

<strong>What do you mean by 'unmanaged'?</strong> I mean vps/containers aren't entered into without your consent and support isn't provided re: software errors/configuration/bugs/etc. At the same time there are multiple techs standing by and I'm often willing to attempt 'best effort' support.

<strong>DDoS protection?</strong> OVH's <a href="http://www.ovh.com/ca/en/anti-ddos/">anti-DDoS mitigation</a>.

<strong>How does it work?</strong> In the event of an attack, OVH 'vacuums up' belligerent traffic into its mitigation infrastructure, absorbing it entirely, while simultaneously allowing for non-offensive connections to carry on as if nothing had happened.

<strong>9Mbps max?</strong> Upgrades are available for the following one-time fees:  
10Mbps - $1  
20Mbps - $2  
30Mbps - $3  
40Mbps - $4  
50Mbps - $5  
60Mbps - $6  
70Mbps - $7  
80Mbps - $8  
90Mbps - $9  
100Mbps - $10

<strong>Extra IPs?</strong> $0.75 / IPv4 / month. American IPs are available upon request. IPv6 = free.

<strong>Test IP?</strong> <a href="http://mtl.ellipsisno.de">167.114.135.46</a>  

<strong>Is X allowed?</strong> Commercial mass email marketing is strictly forbidden on dedicated servers. Using your server(s) for sending mass email will result in an immediate termination with no refund. Otherwise, see the <a href="http://ellipsisno.de/terms/">Terms</a>.

<strong>Why Ellipsis Node?</strong> In business for nearly 2 years (formerly <a href="http://lowendtalk.com/discussion/32959/host-nun-1-year-anniversary-sale-1-gb-6-gb-openvz-bhikkhuni-sangha-in-vegas-from-2-49-month">Host Nun</a>), stable servers and no bad reviews. Why not?  

<strong>Are you a reseller?</strong> I resell unmanaged server space. The datacentres I work with don't offer server management either, so choosing Ellipsis Node means roughly the same level of service at lower prices.  

<strong>Do you offer refunds?</strong> VPS come with a 100% money back guarantee for 30 days with no questions asked. Payments for dedicated servers are non-refundable.  

<strong>Further inquiries?</strong> PM or sales@ellipsisno.de. Tailor-made vps plans (i.e. > 999MB RAM) are available via http://ellipsisno.de/build/.
